name: HistopathologyOrCytopathologyTestsByMicroscopicObservation
title: Histopathology or Cytopathology Tests by Microscopic Observation
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Set of lab test names that may be ordered or ‘observed’ for histopathology or cytopathology testing of a clinical specimen by microscopic observation),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: histopathology or cytopathology testing of a clinical specimen by microscopic observation),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
